basics.name: Donald DeAngelo Rose
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Dynamic and results-driven Software Engineer with a passion for problem-solving and innovation. Proven expertise in the full software development life cycle, from concept to delivery. Strong analytical skills paired with effective communication abilities, ensuring seamless collaboration between technical and non-technical stakeholders. Adept at designing and implementing robust solutions that align with business objectives. Continuously strives for excellence in crafting efficient and scalable software systems.

work.summary: As a Technology Consultant at Roselution, a dynamic digital agency, I provided top-notch web development services with an in-house CMS, leveraging modern web stacks and frameworks
highlights: Spearheaded web development projects, focusing on e-commerce maintenance and management for client websites, enhancing their online presence.
Collaborated with product managers, testers, and developers to initiate process improvements, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions.
Adhered to best practices for software development methodology and web security, prioritizing the integrity and security of the digital solutions
Participated actively in the project development through the entire Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC), ensuring a systematic and comprehensive approach.
Studied user requirements and translated them into effective solutions, addressing the unique needs of each project.
Designed and implemented web components across new and existing designs, contributing to visually appealing and functional websites.
Maintained a website analysis spreadsheet by monitoring activity, utilizing data-driven insights for continuous improvement.
Conducted research and developed new technology designs, staying at the forefront of industry trends and innovations.
Researched and developed new technology designInvestigated multiple threading, concurrency, design patterns, and their impacts on application concurrency, improving overall procedural efficiency.
Presented projects to the marketing department, effectively promoting web applications to clients and stakeholders.

work.summary: As the Chief Technology Officer at Bivines Group, a business management firm specializing in the acquisition and development of small businesses, I led a dynamic team of software engineers and developers to drive technological excellence and elevate organizational success.
highlights: Established and nurtured a high-performing team of software engineers and developers, significantly enhancing overall organizational success.

Designed and developed commercial and enterprise websites, apps, emails, and CMS templates adhering to specific brand standards, encompassing content mapping, wire-framing, CMS integration, code guides, and maintenance plans.
Maintained an in-depth understanding of business processes, needs, and objectives, collaborating with developers and engineers to implement technological solutions
Authored development guidelines and frameworks, expediting application design efforts and ensuring adherence to industry best practices.
Customized in-development software to align with clients' current hardware environments, designing applications for seamless integration across multiple systems.
Played a pivotal role in the product development lifecycle, contributing to both back-end and customer-facing solutions.
Reviewed and prioritized strategic architectural updates based on business success drivers, establishing governance processes for effective communication within the development team.

Crafted migration strategies to bridge development gaps between existing software architecture and future updates, presenting visual representations of software architecture designs to stakeholders and senior leadership.
This revised overview aims to showcase your Android development skills while emphasizing your broader software engineering expertise. Feel free to provide more details for further refinement!

work.summary: As the Lead Developer for Shaw's commercial division digital assets, I played a pivotal role in shaping and enhancing software solutions, driving a superior client-side experience and overall functionality across the organization.
highlights: Collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional design teams to create innovative software solutions, significantly improving functionality and performance.
Monitored and optimized automated build and continuous software integration processes, ensuring swift resolution of build/release failures.
Developed, maintained, and designed custom WordPress themes for various commercial brands, demonstrating a keen eye for detail and brand consistency.
Wrote code and supported architecture in high-throughput systems on AWS and Microsoft Azure cloud, contributing to the scalability and robustness of the digital infrastructure.
Worked closely with software development and testing teams to design and implement robust solutions, meeting client requirements for functionality, scalability, and performance.
Managed testing cycles, including test plan creation, script development, and coordination of user acceptance testing in Clarizen-Prism and Workfront.
Utilized Microsoft Visual Studio, Tortoise SVN, and Kentico, creating an in-house AWS commercial stack that supported various projects.
Designed and implemented automation tools and applications, resulting in a remarkable 90% cost efficiency by migrating and condensing servers in AWS.
Established procedures for system monitoring, recovery, backup, and optimization, ensuring the reliability and resilience of the digital infrastructure.
Collaborated closely with business analysts, development teams, and infrastructure specialists to deliver high-availability solutions for mission-critical applications.
Managed and maintained over 300 brand microsites hosted on various platforms such as AWS, Elastic Beanstalk, and Microsoft Azure.

work.summary: Empowered students with foundational tech knowledge, fostering a passion for technology and innovation.
highlights: Developed a comprehensive tech curriculum, complete with assessments, to facilitate engaging class lessons and measure student success.
Instructed interactive sessions that built a solid understanding of basic programming principles among students.
Implemented and managed promotional campaigns, effectively boosting enrollments for the school and its diverse programs.
Hosted engaging presentations and workshops to cultivate interest in technology among children and teens, inspiring a future generation of tech enthusiasts.

volunteer.summary: Provided guidance and support as a personal mentor, assisting at-risk youth in navigating and adapting to environmental changes.
highlights: Recognized for outstanding contributions and dedication, awarded 'Mentor of the Month' for impactful mentorship.
Facilitated workshops and seminars, equipping students with essential life skills and strategies for overcoming adversity.
Established a positive and nurturing mentor-mentee relationship, fostering personal and academic growth.

volunteer.summary: Played a pivotal role at RoseWorks, a leading Tech Learning Company, in developing and delivering engaging weekend programming courses for diverse audiences, including 4th to 9th graders and adults.
highlights: Designed and created comprehensive courses utilizing languages such as Scratch, Python, HTML, and Javascript, fostering an inclusive and interactive learning environment
Developed courses on various topics, including 'Intro to Problem Solving,' 'Intro Programming with Scratch and Python,' 'Intro to Video Game Programming,' and 'Intro to Programming via Music.'
Inspired a passion for technology and coding by providing accessible and fun learning experiences, catering to individuals of all ages and skill levels.

awards.title: Volunteer of the Year
awards.summary: Awarded fo hosting RoseWorks Coding program through the Atlanta-Fulton Public Library system
